original_title: Ça ne peut pas continuer comme ça!
overview: With the President of the Republic very ill, an advisor offers an unusual suggestion: hire a double to replace him during his convalescence. The lucky chosen one is a member of the Comédie-Française but he is also shy, unexciting and often consigned to the supporting role...But a seismic change is about to happen in the Republic.
title: Ça ne peut pas continuer comme ça!
